properties.name: spring.http.encoding.charset
properties.description: Charset of HTTP requests and responses. Added to the Content-Type header if not set explicitly.

properties.name: spring.http.encoding.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable http encoding support.

properties.name: spring.http.encoding.force
properties.description: Whether to force the encoding to the configured charset on HTTP requests and responses.

properties.name: spring.http.encoding.force-request
properties.description: Whether to force the encoding to the configured charset on HTTP requests. Defaults to true when force has not been specified.

properties.name: spring.http.encoding.force-response
properties.description: Whether to force the encoding to the configured charset on HTTP responses.

properties.name: spring.http.encoding.mapping
properties.description: Locale in which to encode mapping.

properties.name: spring.http.log-request-details
properties.description: Whether logging of (potentially sensitive) request details at DEBUG and TRACE level is allowed.

properties.name: spring.servlet.encoding.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Servlet HTTP encoding support.
